actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate concerning freedom and human rights for Tibet.

summary.text: Commends the President for his historic meeting with the Dalai Lama of Tibet. Expresses the sense of the Senate that: (1) the Government of the People's Republic of China should know that the Congress and the people of the United States stand with the Tibetan people and the Dalai Lama in their journey toward freedom; and (2) all Americans are united on the goals of freedom and human rights for Tibet.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate concerning freedom and human rights for Tibet.
